description: Get hands-on and creative at the SoulPrint Crafts Corner! Drop in anytime to try out different activities. From making your own paper shoes using recycled materials and fabrics, to exploring fun and imaginative drawing and painting. It’s a welcoming space for all ages to experiment, make something unique, and enjoy the joy of crafting together. Bring your own t-shirt or tote bag and upcycle!

events.name: Drop in: Bartholomew Fayre: Craft Corner

factsheet.heading: Bartholomew Fayre: Craft Corner
paragraphs: Get hands-on and creative at the SoulPrint Crafts Corner! Drop in anytime to try out different activities. From making your own paper shoes using recycled materials and fabrics, to exploring fun and imaginative drawing/ painting on choice of denim clothing. It’s a welcoming space for all ages to experiment, make something unique, and enjoy the joy of crafting together. Bring your own t-shirt or tote bag and upcycle!

location.address: Smithfield Rotunda Garden, West Smithfield, EC1A 9PT

name: Bartholomew Fayre: Craft Corner
